Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Chicago Ave/Austin
ShortDescription: EB 66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Augusta, Central, and Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Augusta, Central, and Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier unauthorized person near Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier unauthorized person near Pulaski.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
